Class Alice

  • java.lang.Object
    • Alice

  • public class Alice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the functionality that Alice requires to encrypt, generate, writing to a file and looking up. Based on Questions 1,2,4
    Author:
    Eddie Thuo, Luke Okomilo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Alice() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Puzzle[] createPuzzles()
      Generates 1024 puzzles each with their own unique id.
      static java.lang.String[] encryptPuzzles(Puzzle[] puzzles)
      Encrypts all 1024 puzzles individually based on their unique id using the DES encryption standard.
      static javax.crypto.SecretKey lookupKey(int puzzleID, Puzzle[] puzzles)
      Responsible for enabling Alice to lookup the key asscociated the given puzzle number.
      static void writePuzzlesToFile(java.lang.String[] encryptedPuzzles)
      Responsible for writing each cryptogram into a text file.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns:
        array of 1024 puzzles

      • encryptPuzzles

        public static java.lang.String[] encryptPuzzles(Puzzle[] puzzles)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Encrypts all 1024 puzzles individually based on their unique id using the DES encryption standard.
        Parameters:
        puzzles -
        Returns:
        1024 encrypted puzzles.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • writePuzzlesToFile

        public static void writePuzzlesToFile(java.lang.String[] encryptedPuzzles)
        Responsible for writing each cryptogram into a text file.
        Parameters:
        encryptedPuzzles - The number of encrypted puzzles

      • lookupKey

        public static javax.crypto.SecretKey lookupKey(int puzzleID,
                                               Puzzle[] puzzles)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Responsible for enabling Alice to lookup the key asscociated the given puzzle number.
        Parameters:
        puzzleID - The unique puzzle number
        puzzles - Number of puzzles
        Returns:
        SecretKey if in fact the key was found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
